name: Spectot
description:
Taken too soon, the Reaper offers you a second chance at life. Collect the bones and settle his debts.

Made for the Nestalgia NES Jam. This is my first jam and first completed project.

A & D - Left & Right

N - Boomerang

M - Jump (hold to glide)

P - Start/Pause

Gamepad Compatable (hopefully)
